text: Jason James Carter (born August 7, 1975)U.S. Public Records Index Vol 2 (Provo, UT: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc.), 2010. is an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Georgia State Senate from 2010 to 2015. Carter was the Democratic Party nominee for Governor of Georgia in 2014. He is the grandson of U.S. President and Georgia Governor Jimmy Carter. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:People from Decatur, Georgia Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Jimmy Carter Category:Lawyers from Atlanta
title: Jason Carter (politician)
